amendment.description: To propose alternative requirements and limitations applicable to individuals detained at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

action.text: Amendment SA 2255 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Ayotte.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2255, under the order of 11/19/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 237.
